sentences.sContent: Perhaps, but the contrast is ambiguous and unclear.
sentences.sContent_eng: Perhaps, but the contrast is ambiguous and unclear.
sentences.sCn: 也许可以，但对比却是模糊不清的。

sentences.sContent: Documentation can be ambiguous in the most insidious ways.
sentences.sContent_eng: Documentation can be ambiguous in the most insidious ways.
sentences.sCn: 文档可能有很多模糊不清的微妙之处。

synos.tran: 模糊不清的；[数]引起歧义的

remMethod.val: ambi(二) + guous(做…的) → 两件事都想做的 → 含糊的
